titleStmt.title: An historicall relation of the military government of Gloucester, from the beginning of the Civill Warre betweene King and Parliament, to the removall of Colonell Massie from that government to the command of the westerne forces by John Corbet ...
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.B. for Robert Bostock ...,

notesStmt.note: Wrongly ascribed in the Wing catalogue to John Corbet, 1603-1641.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
